title: The Poet's View: Intimate Profiles of 5 Major American Poets
description:
5 mkv files, one per poet

(MKV??? --> use VLC media player, it is free and is you'd use enjoy NOW)

 John Ashbery,
              Louise Gluck, 
Anthony Hecht, 
               Kay Ryan, 
    W.S. Merwin


The Poet's View offers unprecedented access into the life and work of some of America's finest poets. These films are warmly insightful portraits recorded in the personal setting of each poet's home and at various locations. The Poet's View offers an up-close invitation into the day-to-day life of the poet and an opportunity to hear poems read by the author. (From the publisher's Website).

ripped from a dvd copy. I am no technician, but did my best.
